Question: in which year tendulkar nominated as Member of Parliment

Answer:
Question: upto which year tendulkar nominated as Member of Parliment

According to the context, Sachin Tendulkar was nominated as a Member of Parliament (Rajya Sabha) by presidential nomination from 2012 to 2018. Therefore, up to what year was Tendulkar nominated as Member of Parliament?

Answer: 2018
